cause.description:
Our cause is to reverse the effects of companies cutting down forests for housing, roads, buildings, etc.
1. Rainforests and Forests should not be cut down for commercial business or for other reasons such as this.
2. The forests should be replanted.
3. The trees lend to the world's oxygen supply.
cause.mission: To stop the destruction of rainforests and other forests around th world.
cause.name: Stop Deforestation!
